title: Congaree National Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Congaree National Park is open 24 hours a day year round.The Harry Hampton Visitor Center is open 7 days a week, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM and is closed on all federal holidays. Trail maps and brochures, as well as restroom facilities and water are available in the Visitor Center breezeway 24 hours a day. Call (803) 776-4396, or email the park for more information.  Â     There is always something to discover at Congaree any day of the week. NPS Photo/jt-fineart
